participant_1.background:
I have a dog and a cat, both of whom are very well-behaved.
my mother is a librarian.
I want to learn more about how to overcome my fears and live a more fulfilling life.
i speak fluent german.
I love the fact that my job allows me to travel and meet new people.

participant_2.background:
I'm five foot nine inches tall, but I don't care because I love my body.
I was honored to be able to donate blood in honor of my late sister.
My collection of raincoat-wearing toys is priceless.
i play quarterback.
I'm a singer, although my asthma limits my singing to solos.

content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing well also. Thank you! I love that your mother is a librarian. I love books and libraries so much.
Me too! She's always been a great role model for me.
That's awesome! What's your favorite book?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think I'd have to say The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.
I love that book! I've read it a few times. It's so funny.
Right? It's one of my go-to books when I'm looking for a good laugh.
Do you have any other hobbies?
Oh yeah, I play quarterback for my high school team. I also sing, although my asthma limits my singing to solos.
That's cool! I've always wanted to play quarterback, but I'm not very athletic.
It's a lot of fun! But it can be pretty tough, too.
I can imagine! Well, it sounds like you have a lot of great hobbies.
Thanks! I try to keep myself busy.
Me too. I like to stay active and have fun.
That's a good way to live life
